DescriptionData.Title: Hypochlorous Acid Generator Generator of Electrolyzed Water in 8 Minutes with Salt + Water Bacterial Compatible Household DIY 3 Concentration Spray Head / Usb Cable Included
DescriptionData.Description:
At AIWKR we strive to make your life easier.

This hypochlorite water generator, you can create your own disinfectant using water and salt, which is convenient and practical.

FEATURES
1.It is made of high PC material. Thick and more durable high temperature resistance no odor with beautiful and elegant design.
2.It is suitable for family, hotel, office building, can be used in the kitchen, bathroom, restroom, etc.

SPECIFICATIONS
Material: PC

Capacity: 300ML

Size：75*75*272mm/2.95*2.95*10.71in

Usage: Infinite loosp use

Generation time: 8 miuntes

Voltage: 5 V

Power: 500W

HOW TO USE
Add water and salt to the pot and start with one click.
After the disinfection solution is made, spray it evenly.
After the surface of the items to be disinfected is wet, wipe with a rag.

PACKAGE INCLUDE
1 x Disinfection Water Maker
1x USB cable

PRECAUTIONS
1.Do not use on silk, wool, nylon, leather, painted surfaces
2. Do not use for aluminum, copper, carbon steel products, suitable for stainless steel appliances
3. Do not mix with acid cleaner products (toilet cleaner etc.)
4.Please refer to the concentration ratio

AFTER SALE
If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact us, we will reply within 24 hours to provide you with the best service.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: ★ PRINCIPLE OF ELECTROLYSIS: Sodium hypochlorite solution is a widely used disinfection product, which is weakly alkaline. Electrolytic brine (NaCl solution) can generate chlorine gas on the anode, and at the same time produce sodium hydroxide in the solution. Chlorine is dissolved in water and forms sodium hypochlorite with sodium hydroxide in the solution.

★ SIMPLE OPERATION / MATERIALS: Water + salt electrolysis can produce detergents, easy to operate, effective cleaning, and provide a healthy environment for you and your family.moisten the surface of the items to be disinfected and wipe with a rag. Proven to clean as effectively as conventional cleaners

★ 3 KINDS OF CONCENTRATION: Detergent can effectively inhibit harmful substances in the air, prevent the spread of harmful substances, provide 3 kinds of concentration choices, and clean various objects at reasonable concentrations

★ SMALL AND PRACTICAL: Small size, easy to carry and easy to use. For business travel, family, camping, etc., the spray bottle is transparent, the sealing of the bottle mouth is very good, health, safety and no leakage

★ USE OCCASIONS: kitchen and bathroom cleaning, furniture surface, air disinfection, wound disinfection, childrens toys, floor carpets, pet supplies, etc.Can be used on any surface such as showers, toilets, countertops, pet gear, sports equipment and more.

DescriptionData.Title: Sodium Hypochlorite Generator, 99% Bacteria Elimination Electrolyzed Hypochlorite Maker Efficient Sterilization Just 8 Minutes Healthy Homemade
DescriptionData.Description:
At AIWKR we strive to make your life easier.

This hypochlorite water generator, you can create your own disinfectant using water and salt, which is convenient and practical.

FEATURES
1.It is made of high ABS and PC material. Thick and more durable high temperature resistance no odor with beautiful and elegant design.
2.It is suitable for family, hotel, office building, can be used in the kitchen, bathroom, restroom, etc.

SPECIFICATIONS
Material：ABS + PC

Working time: 8 minutes

Applicable power supply: 5V /1A

Product power: 5W

Product capacity: 300ml

Product weight: 350g

Size:238*93mm/9.4x3.7inch(HxW)

PACKAGE INCLUDE
1 x Disinfection Water Maker
1x USB cable

Concentration ratio and use range:

(1) Low concentration: 300ml water + 7.5g common salt * concentration is about 300-500mg / LCan be used for wound, air, mosquito bite, hand washing, etc.

(2) Standard concentration: 300ml water + 15g table salt * concentration is about 500-800mg / LCan be used for beriberi, household products, baby utensils, tableware, kitchen toilet, denture cleaning etc.

(3) High concentration: 300ml water + 22.5g salt * concentration is about 1000-1500mg / L


PRECAUTIONS
1.Do not use on silk, wool, nylon, leather, painted surfaces
2. Do not use for aluminum, copper, carbon steel products, suitable for stainless steel appliances
3. Do not mix with acid cleaner products (toilet cleaner etc.)

AFTER SALE
If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact us, we will reply within 24 hours to provide you with the best service.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: ★【Simple Operation / Materials】Water + salt electrolytic cell can produce cleaners, easy to operate, effective cleaning and provide a healthy environment for you and your family.

★【Eco-friendly】Non-toxic, harmless and chemical residue-free sodium hypochlorite generator can be made in the home with only ordinary salt and tap water, and it can safely disinfect all aspects of life.

★【 3 kinds of Concentration】Detergent can effectively inhibit harmful objects in the air, prevent the spread of harmful objects, provide 3 kinds of concentration choices, and clean various objects with reasonable concentrations.
★【Sodium Hypochlorite】Sodium hypochlorite is a strong oxidant, has a strong cleaning effect, and can replace oxidants such as bleach.

★【Applicable to Various Places】Widely used in homes, schools, offices, hospitals, hotels and other public places. Physically, health and safety made to fully protect the health of families and children.

DescriptionData.BulletPoint: ★ Scope of Application: The generator can be used to clean and kill microorganisms indoors and outside the human body, and it can also be used to clean fruit and vegetable residues, children's toys, pets, air and clothes.
★ Large-capacity Battery: The generator comes with 1300mA large-capacity battery, one-button electrolysis, and it is easy to carry.
★ Multiple Functions: The generator can release powerful sterilization ability, you can enjoy it at any time, and use it indefinitely.
★ Safe and Effective: Household germicidal deodorant cleaners can be used on hard, non-porous surfaces, such as bathtubs, counters, showers, stoves, toilets, fixtures, sinks, walls and floors.

★ High-speed Electrolysis: 400ml water + 20g edible salt, electrolysis for 6 minutes, concentration 400mg / L, the hypochlorite generator can make free-washing cleaning solution for cleaning the floor. Wipe the furniture.

DescriptionData.BulletPoint: ★OVER-FREQUENCY ELECTROLYSIS TECHNOLOGY: Using industry-leading over-frequency electrolysis technology, water + salt self-made disinfection solution (sodium hypochlorite disinfection water) through rapid electrolysis, sterilization is efficient and environmentally friendly

★HIGH-QUALITY CORE COMPONENTS: High-quality sintered titanium ruthenium-iridium electrode, improve the electrolysis efficiency, and last a long life. According to different salt addition ratio, the effective chlorine content reaches 10 ~ 500ppm, and the sterilization rate is as high as 99.9%.
★SIMPLE DESIGN: The design is inspired by the Eiffel Tower, simple and stylish, 120ML capacity, portable design, to provide you with security anytime, anywhere.
★ULTRA-FINE ATOMIZING SPRAY HEAD: Electroplated silver ultra-fine atomizing spray head, easy to press, labor-saving and durable, spray fine and soft, wide spray coverage.
★SATISFACTION OF AFTER-SELL SERVICE: If you have any problems with the products you order, please do not hesitate to contact us, we will do our best to respond quickly.
